result.execSummary:
The defendant Kevin R Meltesen was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Straight Time if imposed.
Consecutive to: Case 14CM2268

miscConds.notes: Restitution of $300.00 for Joseph J. and $4,534.00 to Gregg Z. to be paid as a condition of probation, before costs and fines.
Costs to be paid as a condition of probation.

Court will grant early termination of probation based on agent's recommendation and completion of all conditions. No Contact with co-defendants, Home City Ice, Joseph J. or Gregg Z. Write a letter of apology to all victims. Maintain full time employment and/or school combination. DNA specimen and surcharge are wavied based on date of violation. Follow through with any treatment or counseling or any other condition recommended by agent. 
  If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.
Request for Expungment was denied by the court.

timeConds.notes: As a condition of probation, as directed by agent.
